body.name: 43 INCH (6040) Zero Radius Design 16 Gauge Topmount Drop In Over the Counter Large Double Bowl 5050 Stainless Steel Kitchen Sink Premium Package 43 INCH (6040) KKR-FT4321-6040

byLineInfo.name: Visit the KH KINGSMAN HARDWARE Store

features: Constructed by premium grade 16 Gauge Extra-Thick 1.5mm thick stainless steel with 4mm (9 Gauge) thick all around solid stainless steel drop-in mounting deck
Zero Radius - sharp inside corners accentuate the modern look and equipped with Sound-Deadening Pads and Protective Undercoating around the Sink
The complete premium package comes sillicone made foldable pot mat, protective bottom grid, and deluxe lift-out basket strainer

Kingsman provides a complete line of sinks with plethora of sizes and styles to choose from. Whether you need Kitchen, Island Bar or Prep sinks, Kingsman will have sinks suitable for all your kitchen needs. Browse our Kingsman Collection for a Sink that suits you….
body.description: Kingsman Premium Stainless Steel Sinks Are Our Most Luxurious Sinks Ever! Durability is golden, the Kingsman Sinks are constructed by True Premium Grade 16 Gauge Stainless Steel, which ensure they can last for years, even under heavy usage by the kitchen enthusiasts! Zero radius - sharp inside corners accentuate the modern look Apart from the beautiful sinks, the Kingsman Sink come as packages with all the goodies you need for your kitchen tasks Crafted from true premium 16 gauge 304 grade stainless steel Zero radius - sharp inside corners accentuate the modern look Topmount, Above The Counter installation - cutout template and mounting hardware included The complete premium package comes with an extra large sillicone made multipurpose roll-up dish rack, a foldable pot mat, protective bottom grid, and deluxe lift-out basket strainer Vibrant brushed stainless steel finish matches perfectly with professional style appliances and ideally complements stone, quartz, and solid surface countertops. Fully Protected by heavy duty sound deadening pads and undercoating for noise reduction Drain opening fits standard 3-1/2" drains & garbage disposals UPC, cUPC, CSA, IAPMO, ANSI and SCC Certified and Listed 43" x 21-1/2" (Exterior) 22" x 17" x 10" (Left Bowl) 17" x 17" x 10" (Right Bowl)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It looks great! We love the two sinks and the extra space. Cleaning is no problem. Glad I purchase the drying rack and the wire dish protectors

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2020
reviews.reviewText: This is an awesome sink! Its beautiful! Had no problem with delivery or install. Usually sinks have a tendency to show up dented but not this one. They forgot to put the pot holder in the box but I have an email sent out and I'll update later if they send it. Overall it is well worth the money. Thanks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2021
reviews.reviewText: This sink changed my kitchen-quality is fabulous-customer service impeccable-it arrived early and was packed so well-what a great company to deal with!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2019
reviews.reviewText: My husband and I (mostly me) wanted to update our kitchen with very little $$. We had an old triple sink that wasn't deep enough. We weren't going to replace the countertops so we had to find a sink to fit in the 43" cutout. I was so happy when we found this one so reasonably priced. My husband installed it and we love it! It's very modern and sleek. We replaced our faucet about a year ago and they are awesome together. We also replaced the hardware on our cabinets and now our kitchen has been updated and looks great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The sink is great but.....
reviews.reviewText: The sink is great but the four little rubber mats are so small they are a joke. Not in anyway big enough to protect the bottom of the sink.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful. Only downfall is that it’s not fingerprint friendly so you have to constantly clean and with the stainless stuff. With that said, I would do again in heartbeat, really transformed kitchen. Deep sinks, awesome!!!!!!Do need 2 to install and is as complicated as it would seem but very doable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid product, good price
reviews.reviewText: Good quality, had to get them to send the drying rank which didn't come in first shipment. Flat bottom is way more useful than radiused corners. I never thought about it before but the sink is much more usable with flat bottom

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Love the large area, need a bigger faucet to reach far corners

reviews.reviewTitle: Industrial Sink - The focal point of my kitchen
reviews.reviewText: With the final installation now behind us, I am pleased to report this sink, in a splendid way, enhances the overall appearance of my former kitchen. I am so pleased. For the countertop I opted to increase the width to 25 inches to allow for greater clearance for the front and back of sink. The individual sinks are large and are able to accommodate my rather large 14" diameter iron wok for cleaning.This sink does have zero radius corners which was new to me. My solution is to use Mr. Siga, heavy duty scrub sponge that have cleverly cut corners for cleaning such corners. For cleaning I use baking soda and sometimes add vinegar.The sink does lay flat meaning you really should have a faucet with a retractable nozzle to reach all corners of the sink. I will say more time is needed for cleaning but that is small price to pay for having such a beautiful and accommodating sink to meet my everyday cooking needs. Thank you so much.
Just installed today. Looks very elegant. Dish racks are of good quality as well. Will post a final review after using it for few months
Very thick metal and nice finish with a simple design and works very well.
